text: Audacity is a free audio-editing program
for Windows, Mac, and Linux.

It lets you create songs
and podcasts for free.
To download it, first go to
Audacityteam.org/download.
Scroll down to the blue text that says

"Download Audacity for
Windows, Mac or Linux."
This link will take you to Fosshub.com,
where Audacity hosts their downloads.
Next, select your operating system.

The program is available
for Windows, Mac, or Linux.
We'll be downloading the Mac version,

but the process will be similar
for any option you choose.
Open it once it downloads.
A progress bar will appear.
When it's done, you'll see a window
where you can drag the program
into your applications folder.

Once it's moved to the
applications folder,

you can open the program
and start recording.
